content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'vbpa' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.vbpa
	(
	 [VBELN] int,
	 [LIFNR] nvarchar(4000),
	 [PARVW] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_vbpa
--AS
--BEGIN
--drop table dbo.vbpa
truncate table dbo.vbpa
COPY INTO dbo.vbpa
(VBELN 1, LIFNR 2, PARVW 3)
FROM 'https://dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/3caracoes/VBPA/*.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.vbpa
GO
